ygData.subject: RE: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll take hard every time over useless.  Right now there are some cool quests for many, if not all, the other classes.  The last bard quest I did I got Chant
ygData.messageBody:
I'll take hard every time over useless. Right now there are some cool
quests for many, if not all, the other classes. The last bard quest I did I
got Chant of Battle. yay for me.

Kitasi
Knight of Truth
and still not KoS to the Freeport Militia
(are these guys stupid or what?)

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 8:51 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Temple of Solusek Ro


From: John Robertson <johnr@...>


You know, you all joke about this now, but once we find out what these
quests
really are, you're going to WISH it was like this. The only ones I've seen
explained are the necro quests, and they are HARD.

Jyzan
